Note: This document lists changes only since the 1.76.1 release. If you instead want a record of the complete list of changes for the codebase over its entire history, you can obtain one by running the following commands:
svn checkout https://docbook.svn.sourceforge.net/svnroot/docbook/trunk/xsl svn log --xml --verbose xsl > ChangeHistory.xml

Fix http://bugs.debian.org/605696. Citing:
The English form of that section name is mandated to be NAME. lexgrog recognises NOMBRE in Spanish, which when I last looked was the common form used in that language. "NOMBRE DE REFERENCIA" is not recognised by lexgrog, and it's unnecessarily long anyway. I'd rather not add more forms to lexgrog unless absolutely necessary.

Add verbose param to subtitle.markup templates to allow its error message to be ignored. Add that param to fop1.xsl application of subtitle.markup to avoid unnecessary error message in document information.

screen.phrase: Add support for chunked.filename.prefix param. Make sure base.dir value has a trailing slash in the chunk.base.dir internal param used by the templates.

Fix bug when $toc.section.depth=0 causes book toc to ignore chapters and appendixes.
Fixed bug #3388088 where non-namespaced chunkfast.xsl not properly handling namespaced document.

Now handles caption in html markup table like title, so formal.object.title is used with all its features, including formatting and placement. Added htmlTable.with.caption template to handle the wrapper, and left htmlTable template unchanged. Now caption template in mode="htmlTable" does nothing, because caption handled by formal.object.title template.
Turn off generating the title attribute for block and hierarchical elements. Should only be used for inline elements, usually using the alt element. Also used for links to show the target title.
Add support for generate.consistent.ids parameter.
Support author/orgname in bibliography, fixing bug 3293062.
Replace duplicate undocumented parameter chunker.output.quiet with the original documented parameter chunk.quietly.

The spacing="compact" attribute on lists in HTML no longer outputs compact="compact" (or just "compact" in the case of Saxon 6), since that attribute is deprecated and improperly supported. Instead, the output uses a multiple class attribute such as class="orderedlist compact". Use CSS to style such lists without margin above.
Table title with tocentry="0" attribute is now omitted from the table of contents. Fixes bug 3279748.
Add default class="phrase" when role attribute not used for class, fixing bug #3076510
Allow selection by role for multiple imageobject elements within an imageobjectco, which since Docbook 5 allows multiple imageobjects.
Remove broken style for autotoc.xsl.
Fix bug: when $index.links.to.section is set to zero, the primary index entry duplicates links that should be only on secondary entries. Now the links are not duplicated.
Add mode="no.anchor.mode" to remaining xref-to templates that do not have it to avoid generating an invalid nested anchor in HTML output.
Improve doc descriptions of dbhtml filename and dir.
Turn off fast chunking messages if chunker.output.quiet is set to 1.
Add setindex to context param in mode="reference" to better support setindex.
Support set as child of set in set.toc template.

Fix Debian bug #611924 (http://bugs.debian.org/611924):
A quote element with an xml:id will lead to two anchors with the same name or ID which is not allowed. So don't call the anchor template. It is already called by inline.charseq.
Fix call to generate.css.files so .css files can be generated when in chunking mode.
Change question and title templates to replace hard-coded class="local-name()" with mode="class.attribute" to support customization of class values.
Call "generate.css" in process.root so it can participate in the 'make.clean.html' scheme.
Fixing typo (spurious ! at the end of line).
Separate book appendixes from article appendixes (so that they can be customized independently)
Added condition to prevent "Failed to interpret image" messages (SVG is not supported by the graphic size extension).
Fix bug 3116969 where mode="class.value" customization did not work for table or informaltable.
